items.text: length on off, Williamson wants to come forward but the ball kicks at him, he takes his bottom hand off the bat as he defends
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: full and angled across, squirted away to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: full and angled across, it's overpitched and the field is up on the off side, Taylor clears his leg a little and goes through the covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: slower and on the pads, pushed to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: full on middle, quicker delivery, pushed to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full on off, comes forward and defends to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: length on middle, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: full and tailing in slightly from off to middle, Taylor presents a straight bat and pushes it to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: slower ball outside off, Taylor taps it to point, looks for the single but Williamson sends him back nice and early
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: length on off, stays back and defends back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: length and angled in, clipped to deep square leg for one
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: slower ball outside off, steered to third man for one
items.postText: Shashank steps in for a short while. A real cruise for New Zealand
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: Bangladesh have some belief now. Williamson has picked out deep midwicket. Stepped out to flick, didn't get to the pitch but went through with the flick, hand came off the grip, there was no power in the stroke and turned out to be an easy catch.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, OUT

dismissal.text: KS Williamson c Mosaddek Hossain b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 40 (108m 72b 1x4 0x6) SR: 55.55

items.preText:
Tom Latham is the new man in


U Jack: "Among the many reasons why I want New Zealand to win this World Cup is for that man; Ross Taylor, to the get the credit he deserves. This may be his last World Cup and I hope he shines and leaves his mark on cricket."
items.text: slips this down leg, wide. Easy call.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 wide

items.text: works this into the gap at midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: beauty! Drift in and then turn to beat his forward prod.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, no run

items.text: nice and full on the stumps, smothered
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, no run

items.text: lunges forward to defend, gets an inside edge onto the pad
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, no run

items.text: what a catch at deep midwicket! This was a poor ball, not the one Mehidy would've hoped to get a wicket out of, but he has and he couldn't be happier. All the team members run across to congratulate Shaifuddin, who ran in a few yards from the boundary and then threw himself full-length forward to complete an excellent catch. The game has come alive
items.postText: New Zealand started the 32nd over with a win percentage of 96. After those two wickets, it's slipped to a still comfortable 89 according to ESPNCricinfo's Forecaster.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, OUT

dismissal.text: TWM Latham c Mohammad Saifuddin b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 0 (5m 4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.preText: Jimmy Neesham the new man in. Is he allowed to quickly tweet a reaction to that catch?
items.text: full on the stumps from round the wicket, defended back
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: skids one through on middle and leg, defended.
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: drifts in but this one has slipped down leg, wide called
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, 1 wide

items.text: gets to the pitch of the ball as he defends back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: cut away to sweeper point
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, 1 run
